event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{Resource {0} is not closed or saved in {1}.}{{code{br}}}{{code{readLine}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Condition {0}, taking true branch}{{code{line.startsWith("Call graph node for function")}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Falling through to end of if statement}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Resource {0} is not closed or saved in {1}.}{{code{br}}}{{code{readLine}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Throwing {0} (or subclass) from call to {1}; exiting method with uncaught exception.}{{code{java.io.IOException}}}{{code{readLine}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.type: Resource leak on an exceptional path
typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: The system resource will not be reclaimed and reused, reducing the future availability of the resource.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: Leak of a system resource on an exception path (probably error handling)
